summary: The Hague is a city in the Netherlands and the capital of South Holland province. It's the country's administrative center and home to the Dutch government, even though Amsterdam is the official capital. With over 800,000 people in its urban area, it's one of the largest cities in the country. The Hague is also known for international law, with many important courts and organizations based there. It's a busy place with lots of companies, embassies, and even a royal family presence. The city also has a popular beach area called Scheveningen.
title: The Hague
